WorkerCompCoverageClass.name: WorkerCompCoverageClass
WorkerCompCoverageClass.description: Represents the compensation coverage class that a worker belongs to.

InsurancePolicyCoverageId.description: The coverages included in the insurance policy.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The insurance policy that covers this compensation coverage class.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the compensation coverage class.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

Premium.description: The premium for the insurance policy that covers this compensation coverage class.

TotalExposure.description: The payroll that the employees of this compensation coverage class belong to.

WorkerClass.description: The code that represents the compensation class of the employees.

WorkerCount.description: The number of employees in this compensation coverage class.

WorkerLocationId.description: The location where the worker is employed.
